title: Tech News: Robots Can Be Scary
itunes:title: Tech News: Robots Can Be Scary
description:
A New York council member wants to ban police from owning weaponized robots. A San Francisco couple who co-founded a startup face multiple charges of fraud. And which app is the most invasive?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
